page.title: 13SELSEY NURSING HOMES PART 2
page.content: {Matron}and all her{staff}must be fully{qualified}nurses.There are seven nurses on duty all day from 3 until 11 o'clock then two on duty through the night.It is usually married women who do night duty.{Night nurses}do not give breakfast or get residents up in the morning. Residents can have {visitors}at{anytime.}There is a sitting room which the residents can stay in as long as they like. Some go out in a wheelchair in the garden. Every Tuesday an{occupational {therapist}comes and gives them something to do.
